# Portfolio Project - Copilot Instructions

This is a React + Vite portfolio website with Tailwind CSS.

## Project Structure
- React 18 with Vite
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Modular component architecture

## Components
- Hero: Large bio and logo section
- Toolbox: Tech stack grid
- Experience: Project cards list
- ContactForm: Controlled form
- Footer: Copyright and social links

## Design System
- Fonts: Manrope (headings), Inter (body)
- Colors: #587B7F (Primary), #1E2019 (Secondary), #394032 (Tertiary)
- Dark UI with background gradient
